chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In today's video, we will learn about Core Web Vitals and why they are important.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Like this video and keep your energy high.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The thing is that your website should run on all devices in iPad, iPhone, Android, Surface Pro 4.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Because we have to give a good experience to all users through our website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In this video, we will also learn that there is a hidden tool in Chrome called Lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And how you can use it to enhance your website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So write in the comment section below, Sigma Batch OP.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen. Let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So guys, I have come here to my computer screen.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And now I will make a new folder whose name is Video 6.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Video 6 and here in Video 6, I will open VS Code as always.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And the thing I am going to tell you today is very important from the aspect of SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: First of all, I want to tell you what is SEO?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If you see any website, then SEO is there in it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Let's take the example of Amazon.in.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I opened Amazon.in, so Amazon.in wants this website to be loaded as soon as possible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So that their products can come in search.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google is a search engine.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google's responsibility is to show the best pages to the users.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So Google wants to show only those pages that are fast,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Present information very well,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And along with that, there are some things in them that the user has a good experience.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, let's say there are two pages.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: One page has told about dog food.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The other page has also told about dog food exactly the same time.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But the page 2 of these two is loaded very fast.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: It loads well, so Google will give it more preference.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Along with that, there are core web vitals that Google considers to rank two pages.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: First of all, content is important.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: What is on your page?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If your content is good, then your website can rank without core web vitals.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But if you are competing with a page that has presented almost similar quality content,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Then your core web vitals will be seen.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And if your core web vitals are good, then you will be given preference.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So the first thing that comes in the core web vitals is your CLS.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You see this video here, which I have run from the web.dev website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You will see that someone comes to your website and he is trying to cancel the order here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And by mistake, the time he canceled, this thing above became visible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And he shifted the layout and the order was completed.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But the user wanted the order to be incomplete, he wanted to click on no.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In this case, the user experience is very bad.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And as you saw in this video, it should not be like this.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: That's why our CLS should be as low as possible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now what is the definition of CLS?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Cumulative layout shift means how much is shifting while the page is loading.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose you have loaded the page and first of all you get to see this.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This was above and then when this key term part was loaded, then everything was shifted below.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The layout should not be shifted.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If you put width and height in images, then the layout will not shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The next metric we are going to talk about is LCP.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And LCP stands for Largest Contextual Paint.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This means that if the user is viewing a page, then the biggest element on it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, the biggest part in this is this image.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: How long is it loading?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Means the whole page will be loaded, but the biggest element which is the most important,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: How long is it loading?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: According to web.dev and google, a good LCP score should be 2.5 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: That is, the biggest element of the page should be loaded in 2.5 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: After this comes the third metric which is FID.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Which stands for First Input Delay.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: First Input Delay means that if any user has clicked on any input element,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Like on a button or any type of input on a page,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So how long does that input process?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, if you click on a button, then how long does that button click browser process?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And according to google and web.dev, your input should start processing in less than 100 milliseconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So these were the three core web vitals which are very important.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For your information, these core web vitals are also updated.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But these three are very important and you should know.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now I will show you what is the lighthouse report and why do they generate?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And how will these three core web vitals get value from there?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So I tell you here, if you inspect by right-clicking,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And you may be coming to the right side,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You can bring it down by right-clicking.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If you want, you can bring it here again and bring it down by right-clicking.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I prefer it down because I am used to looking down from the starting.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now you are getting the option of lighthouse here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Lighthouse basically generates a report for you and tells you what can be improved in your HTML page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, if I want to see how mobile users see my website,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Then I will click on mobile or I will click on desktop, I will close this tab.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I will click on mobile and click on analyze page load.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So this will generate a report for me.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You can see that a report has been generated here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Performance, accessibility, best practices, SE and PWA are being shown.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now you can see that some things are shown in red here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: That is, there is a scope of improvement in the page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now you are telling that size your images properly.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Your website can be loaded fast 2.7 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So all these suggestions are given to you by lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And if you incorporate these suggestions, then your website will be loaded very well.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And will give a good experience to the user.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now you can see that it is written here that image elements do not have explicit width and height.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So you should give width and height.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The width and height attribute of the image that we read in the last video should be used.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So that it is reserved in your browser.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: When we set width and height in HTML, then it is reserved in the space browser.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Otherwise, if we do not set height and width, then what will happen is that

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Our browser will not know how much space to reserve.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And as long as the CSS is loaded, the whole page will shift from the bottom.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So we do not want our page to shift during loading time.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If our page starts shifting, then if we are going to click here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So when it is accidentally shifted, it may happen that we click here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose there was an image coming here, I am going to click here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And as long as I clicked, this image was loaded during that time.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And all this content shifted down.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And instead of clicking here by mistake, I will click on the image.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This is called cumulative layout shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So this kind of shift is not preferred at all.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google does not prefer it at all.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And this should be as low as possible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You can see that the space is very low.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So we have to keep the cumulative layout shift as low as possible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So that our user can get a very good experience.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So here are many more suggestions.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And this is for our mobile.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now we can generate a desktop report.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So the desktop report will be generated.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So as you can see that it has generated a report.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: 92 marks in performance.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: 100 out of 82 in accessibility.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: 75 in best practices and 75 in SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now you see here that the things that are good are told here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And the scope of improvement that is there, it is told to you.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So this is a hidden tool that we should all use.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now I want to tell you about meta tags and meta description.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So what I will do here is that I will make a new file.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I will name it index.html.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And after making an HTML file, the first SEO element I want to tell you is title.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If your title is reflecting the content of your page, then this is a very good SEO practice.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Whenever your page is changing, you make the title in such a way that it reflects the content of your page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Because if you want your website on Google, then it will come according to the title.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google's index is like you guys write code with Harry here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Okay, and if you write like this, then this thing is the title of the page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And this is the title of the page that YouTube has put.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This title is of the page that Instagram has put.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This title is of the page that GitHub has put.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So if the title is on the page and the title actually reflects the content of your page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Then your website will rank very well.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now let's say I put content here and I put an h1 and write Harry here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And after that, let's say I write a paragraph here and write lorem 45 here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now why did I write lorem 45?

chunks.text: I will do view word wrap.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Why did I write 45?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This is a very good question.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I wrote 45 because I am lazy and 4 and 5 are around.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So I reduced 4 and 5.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I also write 23 because they are also around.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Okay, so there is no other reason.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now I will preview it quickly here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I will open in browser here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So see it looks like this.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now this document is written.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If I leave it like this, then it will not be a good SEO practice.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I will write about Harry here and I will write code with Harry here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Which is also my website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Okay, and what will happen by doing this?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: That my title will reflect here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So what will happen by doing this kind of work?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: That my website will have more chances of being seen in Google.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I will inspect and also take out its lighthouse report.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And I will see what are the scope of improvements.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now its lighthouse report will be very big.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Because there is nothing in it that I should improve.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But when I will put images, then I will get suggestions.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Like put width, put height.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Along with that, I will tell you one more trick.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So that you can see your website in any mobile.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You will find out.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So you guys click here.

chunks.text: Can you see the computer here?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And after that if you choose responsive in it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So you can see that how your website will be seen in any kind of device.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So you can see if your website is responsive or not.

chunks.text: If you go to see in a specific device.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This is simply being told to you.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML

chunks.text: And if you want to take a general view.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: That my website is in a responsive device.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In total, your website should look good in all the width devices.

chunks.text: How does this happen?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now I will tell you about Meta Text.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Here I will write like Meta.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Then you will see Meta DESC is coming here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I will click on Meta DESC.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And here I can give the description of my page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose I give.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This is the page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This is a page about.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This is a page which contains description about Harry.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And here you can write whatever page content you have.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Whatever you want.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Like I show you.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose you write what is SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You have written what is SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: See here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This page has put this Meta Description.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: SEO stands for this in simple terms.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now it is not necessary that a search engine will parse your Meta DESC.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: It will not do this.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If it liked it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Then it will parse and keep your Meta DESC here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If you have not put Meta DESC.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Then Meta DESC can be generated from your content.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So this is the responsibility of the search engine.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: What will Bing do?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: What will Google do?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: We do not know this.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But from our side.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Our page should be absolutely to the point.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Especially if we are writing a blog.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And we want our page to rank organically.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So here you can see.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I have put Meta DESC.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now a Meta Keyword used to work a lot earlier.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But now the Meta Keyword.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: That has been deprecated.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Meta Keyword is not used at all now.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The code of Meta Keywords looks like this.

chunks.text: But it is believed that.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Meta Keywords.

text: In today's video, we will learn about Core Web Vitals and why they are important. Like this video and keep your energy high. The thing is that your website should run on all devices in iPad, iPhone, Android, Surface Pro 4. Because we have to give a good experience to all users through our website. In this video, we will also learn that there is a hidden tool in Chrome called Lighthouse. And how you can use it to enhance your website. So write in the comment section below, Sigma Batch OP. Let's go to the computer screen. Let's roll the intro. So guys, I have come here to my computer screen. And now I will make a new folder whose name is Video 6. Video 6 and here in Video 6, I will open VS Code as always. And the thing I am going to tell you today is very important from the aspect of SEO. First of all, I want to tell you what is SEO? SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization. If you see any website, then SEO is there in it. Let's take the example of Amazon.in. I opened Amazon.in, so Amazon.in wants this website to be loaded as soon as possible. So that their products can come in search. Google is a search engine. Google's responsibility is to show the best pages to the users. So Google wants to show only those pages that are fast, Present information very well, And along with that, there are some things in them that the user has a good experience. For example, let's say there are two pages. One page has told about dog food. The other page has also told about dog food exactly the same time. But the page 2 of these two is loaded very fast. It loads well, so Google will give it more preference. Along with that, there are core web vitals that Google considers to rank two pages. First of all, content is important. What is on your page? If your content is good, then your website can rank without core web vitals. But if you are competing with a page that has presented almost similar quality content, Then your core web vitals will be seen. And if your core web vitals are good, then you will be given preference. So the first thing that comes in the core web vitals is your CLS. You see this video here, which I have run from the web.dev website. You will see that someone comes to your website and he is trying to cancel the order here. And by mistake, the time he canceled, this thing above became visible. And he shifted the layout and the order was completed. But the user wanted the order to be incomplete, he wanted to click on no. In this case, the user experience is very bad. And as you saw in this video, it should not be like this. That's why our CLS should be as low as possible. Now what is the definition of CLS? Cumulative layout shift means how much is shifting while the page is loading. Suppose you have loaded the page and first of all you get to see this. This was above and then when this key term part was loaded, then everything was shifted below. The layout should not be shifted. If you put width and height in images, then the layout will not shift. The next metric we are going to talk about is LCP. And LCP stands for Largest Contextual Paint. This means that if the user is viewing a page, then the biggest element on it. For example, the biggest part in this is this image. How long is it loading? Means the whole page will be loaded, but the biggest element which is the most important, How long is it loading? According to web.dev and google, a good LCP score should be 2.5 seconds. That is, the biggest element of the page should be loaded in 2.5 seconds. After this comes the third metric which is FID. Which stands for First Input Delay. First Input Delay means that if any user has clicked on any input element, Like on a button or any type of input on a page, So how long does that input process? For example, if you click on a button, then how long does that button click browser process? And according to google and web.dev, your input should start processing in less than 100 milliseconds. So these were the three core web vitals which are very important. For your information, these core web vitals are also updated. But these three are very important and you should know. Now I will show you what is the lighthouse report and why do they generate? And how will these three core web vitals get value from there? Lighthouse basically generates a report for you and tells you what can be improved in your HTML page. For example, if I want to see how mobile users see my website, Then I will click on mobile or I will click on desktop, I will close this tab. I will click on mobile and click on analyze page load. Your website can be loaded fast 2.7 seconds. So all these suggestions are given to you by lighthouse. And if you incorporate these suggestions, then your website will be loaded very well. The width and height attribute of the image that we read in the last video should be used. So that it is reserved in your browser. When we set width and height in HTML, then it is reserved in the space browser. Otherwise, if we do not set height and width, then what will happen is that Our browser will not know how much space to reserve. And as long as the CSS is loaded, the whole page will shift from the bottom. So we do not want our page to shift during loading time. If our page starts shifting, then if we are going to click here. This is called cumulative layout shift. So this kind of shift is not preferred at all. Google does not prefer it at all. And this should be as low as possible. You can see that the space is very low.
